title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: A View By De-Fault
body: GPS Activities: A View by De-Fault       To answer the quiz questions you will need to:  Visit Geocaching.com to learn more about this EarthCache site.  Take your GPS and go on a hike to the coordinates provided at Geocaching.com. Log your find at Geocaching.com Then, click the quiz link on Geocaching.com to return to this page where you can take the quiz and earn your A View By De-Fault certificate.   Â     Please be patient while the quiz loads. Thank You!(object placeholder)
